import React, { useState } from "react"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import VisualizationDashboard from './VisualizationDashboard'; // Import the dashboard component function App() { // State to handle modal visibility and form data const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const [file, setFile] = useState(null); const [googleScholarLink, setGoogleScholarLink] = useState(""); const [userGoal, setUserGoal] = useState(""); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); // To show spinner const history = useHistory(); // For navigation // Function to open modal const openModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(true); }; // Function to close modal const closeModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(false); }; // Handle file upload const handleFileUpload = (event) => { const uploadedFile = event.target.files[0]; setFile(uploadedFile); }; // Handle Google Scholar Link Input const handleGoogleScholarChange = (event) => { setGoogleScholarLink(event.target.value); }; // Handle User Goal Dropdown const handleUserGoalChange = (event) => { setUserGoal(event.target.value); }; // Handle form submission with 30-second delay and loading spinner const handleSubmit = () => { setIsLoading(true); // Show loading spinner and message setTimeout(() => { setIsLoading(false); history.push("/dashboard"); // Redirect to new dashboard page after 30 seconds }, 30000); }; return (

); } // Add a route switch to render the dashboard on a new page function AppWrapper() { return ( ); } export default AppWrapper;
